title: John Agar | Night Fright (1967) Horror, Sci-Fi | with Carol Gilley, Dorothy Davis (full movie)

sources.title: John Agar | Night Fright (1967) Horror, Sci-Fi | with Carol Gilley, Dorothy Davis (full movie)
sources.description:
Mutants in the Moonlight: Night Fright Strikes
When a government space experiment exploring the effects of cosmic rays on animal life goes awry, the residents of Satan's Hollow find themselves terrorized by a mutant monster.

Original title: Night Fright (1967)  AKA:  E.T.N.: The Extraterrestrial Nasty

Director: James A. Sullivan
Writers: Russ Marker
Stars: John Agar, Carol Gilley, Dorothy Davis, Ralph Baker Jr. 
Genres: Cult Film, Horror, Sci-Fi

Many subtitles available for this movie

00:00 Full Movie
00:42 A couple visits a spooky location and hears a news bulletin about a mysterious crash in the area.
06:12 Two friends discuss philosophical thoughts and share funny stories before encountering a crashed rocket.
21:22 A murder case involving a girl who was chewed up and a boy who is barely alive is being investigated by Clint and Wes.
25:14 A sheriff confronts a group who are investigating a UFO sighting & tells them to leave town.
30:14 A reporter talks to the Sheriff about a story while a group of teenagers plan a secret outing.
33:53 A mysterious puzzle involving a crime lab and a dangerous location unfolds as the characters try to solve the mystery.
43:28 A group of people get trapped and attacked by a mysterious creature in Satan's Hollow.
1:02:06 A government space program project called Operation Noah's Ark resulted in a rocket containing mutated animals crashing near a town.
1:04:03 A group of people gather supplies for a mysterious mission involving duck hunting and decoys.
